resources.string: Sorry, this format is not supported!
Ups, something went wrong! Could not load file.
Sorry, cannot find language of the eBook!
Click the questionmark for further information!
This is a longer test sentence for better testing.
Parsing eBook and adding it to the library!
Are you sure you want to delete this book:
Please pick the language of the book.
Please edit title and author manually.

The sidebar helps the user to quickly navigate through the application.\n\t It can be opened by either tapping the button on the top-left side or by swiping from the left edge to the middle of the screen.

The library contains all your saved eBooks and displays them for you to view or edit.\n\t Pressing an eBook will open it, using the small button on the right side of the list will open a small menu that lets you play, edit or delete the eBook.\n\t Pressing the round \'add\'-Button will open the \'Add Book\' window.
The content view lets the user view all the content chunks of the currently selected book.\n\t The arrow displays the current reading position in the eBook.

The book view will display certain contents of an eBook.
	 When the user presses the round 'play'-Button the application will start reading at the current position of the book, if it is in the current content chunk, else it will start at the beginning.
	 By long pressing a sentence, the user can select it to be read next, instead of the current position.
	 The three buttons on the bottom will let the user mute the reading and fast-forward or fast-backbward a content chunk.

This window lets the user add eBooks from the device\'s drive by clicking the \'add\'-Button.\n\t The list below is a selection of download sites for free eBooks.\n\t By pressing the small button on the right side of the list the application will display an information for every site on how to download an eBook.
The settings give the user the opportunity to change some options for the application and lets him/her reset the database of the application.

After the your browser has loaded the website, search for a book with the search bar.
	 Then click the book in the list that you want to download.
Now scroll down and download the eBook as TXT, PDF or Epub(no images).
After the download is completed, open the eReader application again, go to the 'Add Book' window, click the 'add'-Button and find the book on your device's drive.

After the your browser has loaded the website, search for a book with the search bar.
	 Then click the cover of the book that you want to download.
Now scroll down and click the 'DOWNLOAD'-Button and select either TXT, PDF or Epub format.
	 After the download is completed, open the eReader application again, go to the 'Add Book' window, click the 'add'-Button and find the book on your device's drive.

After the your browser has loaded the website, search manually for a book in the list.\n\t Then click the ePub link to open a new Tab in which you can download the eBook.\nAfter the download is completed, open the eReader application again, go to the \'Add Book\' window, click the \'add\'-Button and find the book on your device\'s drive.
Go to the \'Add Book\' window, click the \'add\'-Button and find the book on your device\'s drive.
